title: ArtyTorrent Pack 50-MusicLab RealStrat Guitar VSTi DXi+Crack
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 50-MusicLab RealStrat Guitar VSTi DXi+Crack
------------------------------------------------------------

Something a little special for Pack 50 - A revolutionary plug-in.

If you&#039;ve ever tried to program a realistic guitar riff with a MIDI soundcard, or tried the guitar presets on even the most expensive synths, you&#039;ve probably been disappointed with the results. Let&#039;s face it, virtual guitars sounded shit!
Until now...
Using multisamples is one thing, but for the ultimate realism you need to be able to imitate the PLAYING of the real thing. This involves much more than adding pitch bend info, fret noise and velocity switching.
Musiclab&#039;s RealStrat is based on a large set of Fender Stratocaster samples, but the real magic comes from the way it uses them. A competent player of this VSTi can get all manner of realistic sounds from it, by utilising his/her left hand to alter the style of playing from one note to the next.
This allows the most accurate imitation of the electric guitar so far.
Just check these videos for example:

Now I can&#039;t promise you&#039;ll be playing like that any time soon, but even a beginner can tease out some realistic riffs and chord progressions with a little time and practice. The vast array of MIDI patterns included means you can get straight into creating usable backing tracks, while people with a working knowledge of guitar playing will soon to get to grips with playing solos.

Included in this torrent is a rip of the CD, PowerISO with which to mount it, a simple crack, and full installation instructions. 
 
Route this VSTi into an Amp Simulator, and you&#039;ll be rocking out without needing to know a headstock from a humbucker.

--
Arty - "We really want to see those fingers!"
11th February 2008.
